title: Synchronization failure
body:
I am using the geth 1.2.2 packaged with the Windows Ethereum wallet, and noticed synchronization started "quick", but then slowed down, failing to catch up. Starting geth manually, I get a log file as follows:

```
I1017 12:01:27.142035    3368 downloader.go:275] Block synchronisation started
I1017 12:01:29.238483    3368 chain_manager.go:722] imported 1 block(s) (0 queued 0 ignored) including 3 txs in 1.2704586s. #395895 [8628e733 / 8628e733]
I1017 12:01:29.753824    3368 chain_manager.go:722] imported 126 block(s) (0 queued 0 ignored) including 196 txs in 515.3406ms. #396021 [2abbe528 /90dd35d1]
I1017 12:01:30.503320    3368 chain_manager.go:722] imported 256 block(s) (0 queued 0 ignored) including 251 txs in 748.4954ms. #396277 [f72c9a75 /f3d0ee7d]
I1017 12:01:31.286839    3368 chain_manager.go:722] imported 256 block(s) (0 queued 0 ignored) including 304 txs in 782.5183ms. #396533 [a88e3601 /f4bc4f5a]
I1017 12:01:33.879559    3368 chain_manager.go:722] imported 256 block(s) (0 queued 0 ignored) including 908 txs in 2.5927198s. #396789 [d46496d9 /ab0b08b0]
I1017 12:01:34.207776    3368 chain_manager.go:722] imported 111 block(s) (17 queued 0 ignored) including 118 txs in 327.2159ms. #396917 [44d231bf / e838f398]
I1017 12:01:34.333858    3368 chain_manager.go:722] imported 0 block(s) (256 queued 0 ignored) including 0 txs in 126.0824ms. #397173 [14974fb8 / 87fefebb]
I1017 12:01:34.389895    3368 chain_manager.go:722] imported 0 block(s) (118 queued 0 ignored) including 0 txs in 55.0364ms. #397291 [4b8cd0b7 / 4ba73fb6]
I1017 12:01:34.914465    3368 chain_manager.go:846] Bad block #397036 (66a5304ac7bbc38281f9bf3194d2cde669121c5e6859db54e2d89de408dccde7)
I1017 12:01:34.914465    3368 chain_manager.go:847] Block's parent unknown 7c6bbd78c1f131dc21d82db2d822a8561cc9f3779090f9fff073245b2f85bccd
I1017 12:01:38.025904    3368 chain_manager.go:722] imported 0 block(s) (1 queued 0 ignored) including 0 txs in 5.0033ms. #396901 [b94f31c6 / b94f31c6]
I1017 12:01:38.165770    3368 chain_manager.go:722] imported 0 block(s) (2 queued 0 ignored) including 0 txs in 5.003ms. #396903 [3ec6a133 / bcfd4878]
I1017 12:01:38.308132    3368 chain_manager.go:722] imported 0 block(s) (4 queued 0 ignored) including 0 txs in 6.0064ms. #396907 [65293931 / 0fc6255e]
I1017 12:01:38.460492    3368 chain_manager.go:722] imported 0 block(s) (8 queued 0 ignored) including 0 txs in 11.007ms. #396915 [c4d36def / 95b74d94]
I1017 12:01:38.619493    3368 chain_manager.go:722] imported 0 block(s) (16 queued 0 ignored) including 0 txs in 15.0099ms. #396931 [a5f2c083 / 9f202cbc]
I1017 12:01:38.789532    3368 chain_manager.go:722] imported 0 block(s) (32 queued 0 ignored) including 0 txs in 25.0162ms. #396963 [9ddd6bcc / a3137077]
I1017 12:01:39.131256    3368 chain_manager.go:722] imported 0 block(s) (64 queued 0 ignored) including 0 txs in 34.0225ms. #397027 [3bce2fd3 / 109d06b3]
I1017 12:01:39.600650    3368 chain_manager.go:722] imported 0 block(s) (128 queued 0 ignored) including 0 txs in 66.0435ms. #397155 [2ec27d5f / b9957ea5]
I1017 12:01:39.802783    3368 chain_manager.go:722] imported 0 block(s) (128 queued 0 ignored) including 0 txs in 64.0412ms. #397283 [3381ff8a / 3738e714]
I1017 12:01:39.887841    3368 chain_manager.go:722] imported 0 block(s) (9 queued 0 ignored) including 0 txs in 6.0046ms. #397292 [891e1bb7 / 1c1629bb]
I1017 12:01:39.904852    3368 chain_manager.go:846] Bad block #397037 (d669cde13421af8b75c6170de0f030b296570b966f460995d3b6504eedf9f754)
I1017 12:01:39.904852    3368 chain_manager.go:847] Block's parent unknown 66a5304ac7bbc38281f9bf3194d2cde669121c5e6859db54e2d89de408dccde7
I1017 12:01:44.903094    3368 chain_manager.go:846] Bad block #397037 (d669cde13421af8b75c6170de0f030b296570b966f460995d3b6504eedf9f754)
I1017 12:01:44.929110    3368 chain_manager.go:847] Block's parent unknown 66a5304ac7bbc38281f9bf3194d2cde669121c5e6859db54e2d89de408dccde7
I1017 12:01:47.982774    3368 chain_manager.go:722] imported 1 block(s) (0 queued 0 ignored) including 1 txs in 6.0049ms. #396901 [b94f31c6 / b94f31c6]
I1017 12:01:48.175087    3368 chain_manager.go:722] imported 0 block(s) (2 queued 0 ignored) including 0 txs in 6.0022ms. #396903 [3ec6a133 / bcfd4878]
I1017 12:01:48.324990    3368 chain_manager.go:722] imported 0 block(s) (4 queued 0 ignored) including 0 txs in 6.8396ms. #396907 [65293931 / 0fc6255e]
I1017 12:01:48.472170    3368 chain_manager.go:722] imported 0 block(s) (8 queued 0 ignored) including 0 txs in 9.0066ms. #396915 [c4d36def / 95b74d94]
I1017 12:01:48.629568    3368 chain_manager.go:722] imported 0 block(s) (16 queued 0 ignored) including 0 txs in 14.0099ms. #396931 [a5f2c083 / 9f202cbc]
I1017 12:01:48.808459    3368 chain_manager.go:722] imported 0 block(s) (32 queued 0 ignored) including 0 txs in 25.0163ms. #396963 [9ddd6bcc / a3137077]
I1017 12:01:49.031696    3368 chain_manager.go:722] imported 0 block(s) (64 queued 0 ignored) including 0 txs in 31.0202ms. #397027 [3bce2fd3 / 109d06b3]
I1017 12:01:49.397939    3368 chain_manager.go:722] imported 0 block(s) (128 queued 0 ignored) including 0 txs in 74.047ms. #397155 [2ec27d5f / b9957ea5]
I1017 12:01:49.690133    3368 chain_manager.go:722] imported 0 block(s) (128 queued 0 ignored) including 0 txs in 70.0464ms. #397283 [3381ff8a / 3738e714]
I1017 12:01:49.793202    3368 chain_manager.go:722] imported 0 block(s) (10 queued 0 ignored) including 0 txs in 10.0048ms. #397293 [891e1bb7 / a1b67d2c]
I1017 12:01:49.904320    3368 chain_manager.go:846] Bad block #397038 (fa080342c11dcd6ce0918454b8933406318454b77114c0932d58033b330bade1)
I1017 12:01:49.905320    3368 chain_manager.go:847] Block's parent unknown d669cde13421af8b75c6170de0f030b296570b966f460995d3b6504eedf9f754
```

So I did a `geth removedb`, and restarted. But after 300,000 blocks something, the synchronization started to fail again.
Could you check and make sure your system time is synchronized correctly

Thanks, that was spot on and fixed my problems!

I dual boot between Linux and Windows, and for some reason Windows usually get the time wrong by two hours when coming from a Linux session.
Got the exact same issue on my Windows machine. Happy it fixed your issue :+1:
